name: Unbox (itch) (LibDev)
description:
DISCLAIMER - THIS IS NOWHERE NEAR FINISHED. THERE WILL BE MORE, THIS IS A PROTOTYPE! ALSO, EVERYTHING WAS MADE BY ME!

Changelog (0.1.2):

The changelog has been moved to the installation folder.

Controls:

  • 1- spawn box
  • 2 - spawn container
  • 3 - spawn marble
  • HOLD LEFT CLICK - pick things up
  • RIGHT CLICK - delete things
  • MIDDLE CLICK WHILST HOLDING LEFT CLICK - freeze object
  • WASD - move duh
  • MOUSE - look duh
  • ESC - pause menu

Hi. Welcome to Unbox. It's an upcoming Unity Sandbox game with not-so realistic physics and cartoony graphics! Yes, the propgun is based on the physics gun from Garry's Mod.
